DataElement.preferredName: Smoking Status Within Past Year Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indicator that describes whether or not a person has smoked within the past year.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An indication of a person's current tobacco and nicotine consumption as well as some indication of smoking history._On the inside; contained in._Before the present time._A period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun, approximately 365 days; a specific one year period.

Concepts.definition: An indication of a person's current tobacco and nicotine consumption as well as some indication of smoking history.

Property.preferredDefinition: On the inside; contained in.:Past; before the present time.:The period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun; a period of time containing 365 days.

Concepts.definition: A period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun, approximately 365 days; a specific one year period.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: The distinguishing qualities or prominent aspect of a person, object, action, process, or substance.

ReferenceDocuments.name: BRIDG mapping for CDE:2798679
ReferenceDocuments.description: PerformedObservationResult.value(ANY=>BL) WHERE PerformedObservation > DefinedObservation.nameCode = "Determine Smoking Status" AND DefinedObservation.focalDateRange(<IVL<EXPR<TS.DATETIME>>).low = {today - 365 days} AND DefinedObservation.focalDateRange(<IVL<EXPR<TS.DATETIME>>).high  = {today}
